content: being on strike i ve had more time than usual to crochet lately i decided to make myself a light lacy hat to wear on the picket line - something i could pull over my ears to keep them warm but that wouldn t overheat my head i started going through beret patterns but couldn t find anything that seemed quite what i wanted at some point the following thoughts went through my head beret round… doilies round… use doily pattern to make lacy beret note blocking makes a major difference in getting the doily part of the beret to lie flat instead of puckering i blocked mine by dampening it and stretching it over a large plate
